definitions.definition: an unnecessary or wrong use of money, substances, time, energy, abilities, etc.:
examples: That meeting achieved absolutely nothing - it was a complete waste of time.

definitions.definition: to not be used, eaten, etc.:
examples: You can even make stock from the bones, so that nothing goes to waste.

definitions.definition: to use too much of something or use something badly when there is a limited amount of it:
examples: You waste a lot of water by taking a bath instead of a shower.
